content: विनिपातः {@--1@} Falling down, a fall. {@--2@} A great fall, calamity, an evil, loss, ruin, destruction; विवेकभ्रष्टानां भवति विनिपातः शतमुखः <ls>Bh. 2. 10</ls> (where it has sense 1 also); विधिहेतुरहेतुरागसां विनिपातोपि समः समुन्नतेः <ls>Ki. 2. 34.</ls> {@--3@} Decay, death. {@--4@} Hell, perdition; <ls>Ś. 5.</ls> {@--5@} Occurrence, happening. {@--6@} Pain, distress. {@--7@} Disrespect.
